author: vukasinmilosevic
body:
Changing default values of CaloLayer2 Agreement plots to be zero in the edge case where the histograms are not filled.
Requested in: https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-770

Backport of #24884
title: Changing default values of Calo Layer 2 DQM D/E Agreement plots
